title.rendered: Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Vice Admiral Kim Pankyu (Rtd.)

content.rendered:
The Honourable Minister of Foreign Affairs, Ambassador Yusuf M. Tuggar (OON) received in audience Vice Admiral Kim Pankyu (Rtd.), Ambassador of the Republic of Korea to Nigeria today 22nd May, 2024.
Discussions centered on Investment cooperation in liquified natural gas, as well as on the proposed MOUs to be signed on the sidelines of the forthcoming Korea-Africa Summit holding in Kintex Ilsan, South Korea in June, 2024.
